channel.title: Slayer Point System
channel.description: Ok so.. i followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=489497.0 when you go into the shop it says you have the right amount of points that you earned (if that makes sense) and when you check the value it says "you need 100 Slayer Points" like its supposed to.. but when you try to buy it, it says you don't have enough coins... and you can buy the items with coins.. just posting here as a last resort before just getting rid of the whole thing. Thanks a lot to whoever can help :)

item.title: Slayer Point System
item.dc:creator: @BaamF BaamF
item.description:
@BaamF wrote:

Ok so… i followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=489497.0 when you go into the shop it says you have the right amount of points that you earned (if that makes sense) and when you check the value it says “you need 100 Slayer Points” like its supposed to… but when you try to buy it, it says you don’t have enough coins… and you can buy the items with coins… just posting here as a last resort before just getting rid of the whole thing. Thanks a lot to whoever can help
